creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: Painting of suit of armor as if on a man in crouching position with head lowered and arms spread with hands on thighs. Shoulder pads and pads hanging from waist are striped blue and gold. Breastplate has circular crest with three leaves in gold. Same crest visible behind leg armor on wooden box that the armor appears to be sitting on. Green straps for securing the shin guards hang loosely.
title: Suit of Armor
